alert.note: Alert for Tripp (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 26 at 5:08PM MST until December 26 at 8:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Tripp County. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 9 PM CST this evening. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected. This will create dangerous conditions. Slow down and use caution while traveling. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.
